page.title: 17LIVING IN NEWTON STEWART
page.content: After coming from the south of England I have lived in Newton Stewart for three months.It is a small and pretty town with small shops.The roads have much less traffic.I find the {climate}milder but with more rain.There is a cinema which is small but it has good films which are mostly P.G. so I can go to them.There is a big park not far from where I live.It has an assault course which is fairly hard.On a Sunday we go on a walk to somewhere interesting.A short drive away are{sub_tropical}gardens open to the public,and an attractive beach nearby,with golden_brown sands.In Newton Stewart area there is lots of wildlife.My parents and I enjoy living in this small,friendly town.
